course.title: MAT 1373 Data Analysis By Computer (3 units)
course.desc: Introduction to a statistical package on a computer. Descriptive statistics and data analysis by computer. The distributions and applications of standard parametric and nonparametric tests are investigated using the simulation function of a statistical package.Course Component: LectureThe courses MAT 1373, MAT 2371, MAT 2377, MAT 2379 cannot be combined for units. This course cannot count for unit in any program in the Faculty of Science.
